tool_description: Verifies the validity and compliance status of special use permits, conditional use permits, variances, and other zoning exceptions.

exception_type.description: Type of exception (variance, conditional use, special permit, etc.)

exception_conditions.description: Special conditions attached to the exception

error_messages: Exception not found: No record found for the specified permit number and property.
Exception expired: The specified exception has expired and is no longer valid.
Exception type mismatch: The exception type does not match the permit records.
Property mismatch: The permit is not valid for the specified property.
Conditions violated: Current use violates one or more conditions of the exception.
usage: Input exception details including permit number and current use to verify validity and compliance with any attached conditions. Essential for validating legal non-conforming uses.

exception_valid.description: Whether the exception is currently valid

conditions_met.description: Whether all exception conditions are being met
